doc.title: Bad Boys Need It
doc.plot: In each of the three scenes, resident spanker Jeff Sterne disciplines a bad boy in the most literal and sensuous sense of 'child-rearing'. First David from New Orleans (then just 21) is stripped and bend over a stool to have his humbled hide tanned by hand and belt. In the second scene Thomas, just 18 (the minimal ages for models in such adult material) doesn't behave in the presence of Jeff in the washroom, and has the textile layers peeled off his chubby backside to be taught hands-on lessons by hand, paddle and belt till his looks a give away color-misfit in the white wash (doubtlessly again at pain of spanking). Finally Jesse, who behaved less angelical then his girlish curls might suggest, gets put over the knee and later has to bend over a couch for unrelenting spankings by hand, hair-brush, paddle and even a BDSM flogger, indirect proof men like Jeff occasionally enjoy educational handy-work even more then just knowing the boys learn their lesson.
